pullRequest.title: CB-8227: Introduce a new entitlement to allow different Data Hub versions than Data Lake

nodes.bodyText: I'm not sure about the blueprint version, because QE sometimes use the same blueprint for multiple runtime versions.

beforeCommit.message: CB-8227: Introduce a new entitlement to allow different Data Hub versions than Data Lake

afterCommit.message: CB-8227: Introduce a new entitlement to allow different Data Hub versions than Data Lake

nodes.bodyText: We shouldn't call the method param stackBlueprintVersion

I think we might need to check the image as well. In the case of pre-warm image, the request won't contain the repository info, but the image id. In this case, we should check the version on the image if this is available at this point.
